qas.question: How many neighborhoods are in Boston?
What division of the City Government designated the 23 neighborhoods?

context: Boston is sometimes called a "<a0_0>city of neighborhoods<a0_0/>" because of the profusion of diverse subsections; the city government's <a2_0>Office of Neighborhood Services<a2_0/> has officially designated <a1_0>23 neighborhoods<a1_0/>.
